title: Arūnas Mika
text:
Arūnas Mika (born 11 November 1970) is a retired <a href="Lithuania">Lithuania</a>n <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="Defender%20%28association%20football%29">defender</a>, who last played for <a href="Sakalas%20Siauliai">Sakalas Siauliai</a>. He obtained a total number of 13 caps for the <a href="Lithuania%20national%20football%20team">Lithuania national football team</a>, scoring one goal.
Honours.
National Team
